key.name: board-color
key.description: Hex color used for the game board background.

key.name: smart-move-mode
key.description: Whether Smart Move is disabled, uses single click, or uses double click.

key.name: spider-suit-mode
key.description: Number of suits for Spider deals (1-4).

key.name: freecell-card-count-mode
key.description: Number of cards for FreeCell deals (26, 39, or 52).

key.name: saved-session
key.description: Serialized game/session state used for crash-safe resume on next launch.

key.name: custom-userstyle-css
key.description: Optional custom CSS applied on top of Cardthropic board styles.

key.name: saved-custom-userstyle-css
key.description: Last saved Custom CSS text, kept even when theme presets are active.

key.name: custom-userstyle-word-wrap
key.description: Whether the Custom CSS editor wraps long lines.

key.name: custom-card-svg
key.description: Optional SVG card sheet pasted by the user and persisted in settings.

key.name: enable-hud
key.description: Show the toolbar area above the stock/waste/foundations row.

key.name: forever-mode
key.description: When enabled, Robot Mode keeps running across outcomes and reseeds.

key.name: ludicrous-speed
key.description: When enabled, Robot Mode runs at 40 milliseconds per move.

key.name: robot-debug-enabled
key.description: When enabled, automation status strings include advanced robot and planner diagnostics.

key.name: robot-strict-debug-invariants
key.description: When enabled, Robot Mode runs additional debug-only state invariant checks and stops immediately on violations.

key.name: robot-auto-new-game-on-loss
key.summary: Robot auto new game on loss
key.description: When enabled, normal Robot Mode automatically starts a new random game after a loss.

key.name: interface-emoji-font
key.description: Optional font family override used for UI text and emoji. Empty uses the app/system default font.

key.name: seed-history
key.description: Serialized per-seed play and win history used by the seed dropdown.
